SEARCH
Package za.co.vortexit.pkg3.v0.autoshutdown

Class APIManager

java.lang.Object
za.co.vortexit.pkg3.v0.autoshutdown.APIManager
public class APIManager extends Object
Manages API interactions with the SePush service for retrieving schedule information and area details.

This class handles authentication, area lookup, and fetching schedules for load shedding stages.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    APIManager()
    Constructs an APIManager and initializes the token and area details from settings.

    • getSchedule

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getSchedule() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Retrieves the schedule information for the configured area.
      Returns:
      JsonNode containing the schedule information, null if there is no loadshedding or an error code
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if there is an error mapping the JSON response
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error processing the JSON response

    • getAreaInfo

      public String getAreaInfo(String search) throws IOException
      Retrieves information about an area based on a search query.
      Parameters:
      search - the search query
      Returns:
      a JSON string containing area name and ID or an error message
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error with encoding the search query
